page.title: 17LEISURE:Cont.
page.content: Party branches, British Legion, Womens Institute, Lions Club, Rotoract, Horticultural Clubs, Cage Bird Societies, Over-60's, Air Training Corps, Brownies, St.John's Ambulence Brigade, Bingo, Discos and Fishing are typical. {NORWICH AND YARMOUTH.} The former has live theatre, cinemas, a Football League side and a University plus many other leisure amenities. The latter has all the attractions of a typical seaside resort plus a large Sports Centre. Their use, however, is dependent on the ownership of a car as there is very little public transport available in the evenings or at weekends.
